 Alicia Van Volish is a former cop and current journalism student who
 wakes up after a one-night stand with a terrible hangover and a lot 
 of questions: How much did she drink? Did she really take that guy 
 home with her? What was his name? And what, exactly, is the Golden 
 Sphere, the mysterious object that seems the source of all Alicia's
 woes?

   1. Extract release
   2. Mount ISO
   3. Install the game
   4. Copy crack from the folder /PLAZA :
   
      -> Folder named /Build 74472 is for EN/DE/FR/IT/ES languages
	  -> Folder named /Build 75341 is for PL/CZ/RU/UA/JP languages
	  
   5. Play
   
   Notes: As developers decided to use different game builds for set of
          languages, we also included 2 complete builds in this release:
		  
		  -> Build 74472 - (English, German, French, Italian, Spanish)
		  -> Build 75341 - (Polish, Czech, Russian, Ukrainian, Japanese)
